content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good morning, Nesibe. Thank you for considering my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. What are your thoughts on the current market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am not sure, I am a student and have limited experience with the rental market in Mannheim. Can you give me some guidance on what a fair price would be for this apartment?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Sure, Nesibe. Based on current market rates, a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim would be around €600 to €700 per month. However, this can vary depending on the location and amenities of the apartment. Keep in mind that the rental price is just one factor to consider when deciding whether or not to rent this apartment. Other factors such as utilities, maintenance, and security may also come into play.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I see. Based on the above information, I would like to negotiate with you on the rental price. Can we agree on a price of €650 per month?

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to be flexible in my negotiations. I understand that you may have other offers or counteroffers, but I am open to discussing any options that you may have.

I am also willing to sign a longer lease agreement if that would help to lower the rental price. I am confident that I can make the rent payments on time and I am committed to maintaining the apartment in good condition.

I hope we can reach an agreement on the rental price that works for both of us. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Certainly, Nesibe. I understand that you are a student and looking for a fair and reasonable rental price. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your openness to discussing different options.

Based on our discussion, I would like to agree to the rental price of €650 per month. This price takes into account the current market rates, as well as the fact that you are willing to sign a longer lease agreement.

I am confident that you will be a responsible tenant and maintain the apartment in good condition. I appreciate your interest in my apartment and look forward to working with you.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. Let's schedule a meeting to finalize the lease agreement and go over any additional details.
name: Heinrich Heine
